title: Wand of Sparking
summaries: The Wand of Sparking is an early-game magic weapon found in regular Chests on the Surface or in the Underground layer. It is also sold by the Skeleton Merchant during the third quarter moon phase. It fires a piercing spark along a parabolic curve, traveling about 16 tiles before dissipating. The spark has a 50*1/2 (50%) / 33.33*1/3 (33.33%) chance to inflict the On Fire! debuff. It deals no knockback.
Its best modifier is Demonic or Deadly, with the former granting improved critical strike chance and the latter granting improved speed. It cannot get modifiers that affect knockback or mana cost.
